sfx.name: Sound Effect
sfx.hint: SFX to play when the animation is played

volume.name: Volume
volume.hint: Volume level to play sfx at (0 - 1)

word.name: Duration of Objection! word
word.hint: Duration to play the Objection portion of the animation

bench.name: Bench Duration
bench.hint: How long to show the bench image after the Objection! word

flip-hostile.name: Flip Hostile Objection
flip-hostile.hint: Cause hostile objections to play on the opposite side by default

objection.name: Objection!
objection.hint: Keybind to run default Objection! Macro (hold Shift to play on the opposite side)
